short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze reddit users by their posts and comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to find out if a reddit user might be interested in your service?
Want to know clients better before starting to chat with them? 
Want to get some suggestions on how to approach potential clients based on their posts and comments?
